channel.title: Npc Dialogue [317]
channel.description:
I've been reading a few tutorials on this, and so far they all say to find this method in my client.java, [code]public void UpdateNPCChat() {[/code], but I don't have that method. Could someone tell me where it might be other than client.java.
I'm using a Delta base by the way.

item.title: Npc Dialogue [317]
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

Try to search for that in your root directory (Where client.java is) Or try searching for different parts of the method in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Dialogue [317]
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

find a npc that sends a dialogue and just search its id.
